name: american lobster
also_known_as: atlantic lobster or true lobster or lobster
distribution: temperate waters of northwest atlantic or from labrador to north carolina
taxonomy: order decapoda (crayfish or crabs or lobsters or shrimp) family nephropidae (clawed lobsters)

name: american plaice
also_known_as: dab or plaice or sole
distribution: continental shelves of the atlantic ocean from the arctic circle to rhode island
taxonomy: order pleuronectiformes (flatfishes) family pleuronectidae (right eye flounders)

name: atlantic cod
also_known_as: cod or codling or codfish or bank cod or scrod or northern cod
distribution: temperate to sub polar waters on the continental shelf in the north atlantic
taxonomy: order gadiformes (cods and relatives) or family gadidae (true cods)

name: atlantic herring
also_known_as: bank herring or shore herring or common herring or sardines
distribution: throughout the north atlantic ocean
ecosystem_habitat: pelagic to coastal in cold to temperate waters
taxonomy: order clupeiformes (herring) or family clupeidae (herrings or shads or sardines or menhadens)

name: atlantic mackerel
also_known_as: mackerel or split or joey or boston mackerel
distribution: throughout the northern atlantic in the western atlantic from newfoundland and labrador to cape hatte
taxonomy: order perciformes (perch like fish) or family scombridae (mackerels or tunas and bonitos)

name: atlantic walrus
also_known_as: walrus
distribution: eastern arctic
ecosystem_habitat: shallow (80m or less) or open water areas with soft sea floors close to land or pack ice
taxonomy: order pinnipedia (seals or sea lions and relatives) family odobenidae (walruses)

name: atlantic wolffish
also_known_as: striped wolffish or seawolf or seacat or ocean catfish
distribution: cold temperate to subpolar north atlantic ocean
taxonomy: order cottiformes (sculpins and relatives) family anarhichadidae (wolffishes)

name: beluga whale
also_known_as: white whale or sea canary or beluga
distribution: throughout the arctic ocean and the st. lawrence estuary
ecosystem_habitat: shallow or coastal waters and near ice edge
conservation_status: endangered or threatened or special concern
taxonomy: suborder odontoceti (toothed whales) family monodontidae (white whales)

name: blue shark
also_known_as: blue dogs or blue pointers or great blue sharks
distribution: global oceans tropical to cold temperate
taxonomy: order carcharhiniformes (ground sharks) or family carcharhinidae (requiem sharks)

name: bowhead whale
also_known_as: greenland whale or greenland right whale or polar whale
distribution: throughout the arctic ocean
taxonomy: suborder mysticeti (baleen whales) family balaenidae (right whales)

name: bubblegum coral
also_known_as: null
distribution: sub polar to polar waters in the north atlantic and north eastern pacific
ecosystem_habitat: hard or soft sediment in areas with strong currents
taxonomy: class anthozoa (corals or anemones and relatives) order alcyonacea (soft corals)

name: canary rockfish
also_known_as: red snapper or fantail or canary or orange rockfish or rock cod
distribution: northeast pacific from the gulf of alaska or usa to baja california or mexico
taxonomy: order scorpaeniformes (scorpionfishes and flatheads) family sebastidae (rockfishes)

name: chinook salmon
also_known_as: ntitiyix or sk’elwis or king salmon or blackmouth or quinnat or chub or spring salmon or tyee
distribution: pacific ocean and rivers from california to alaska and eastern asia
ecosystem_habitat: freshwater rivers and streams or to open ocean environments
taxonomy: order salmoniformes (salmon and relatives) or family salmonidae (trout and salmon)

name: dungeness crab
also_known_as: dungles or market crab
distribution: sub polar and temperate waters of northeast pacific or from the aleutian islands to southern california
taxonomy: infraorder brachyura (crabs with short “tail” hidden under the body) family cancridae (crabs or most

name: fin whale
also_known_as: finback or finner or common rorqual or herring whale
distribution: global or except arctic ocean
taxonomy: suborder mysticeti (baleen whales) family balaenopteridae (rorqual whales)

name: giant pacific octopus
also_known_as: north pacific giant octopus
distribution: northern pacific ocean from japan to california and alaska. found off the coast of british columbia.
ecosystem_habitat: coastal intertidal areas to waters deeper than 100m
taxonomy: order octopoda or family octopodidae

name: green sea turtle
also_known_as: green turtle
distribution: worldwide in tropical to temperate latitudes
ecosystem_habitat: sea grass beds or sandy beaches and open ocean
taxonomy: order testudines (turtles or tortoises and terrapins) or family cheloniidae (hard shelled sea turtles)

name: greenland halibut or turbot
also_known_as: newfoundland turbot or flatty or turbot or blue halibut or black halibut
distribution: circumpolar. in the northeast pacific from alaska to mexico or and in the northwest atlantic
ecosystem_habitat: soft bottoms in arctic and temperate waters
taxonomy: order pleuronectiformes (flatfishes) family pleuronectidae (right eye flounders)

name: greenland shark
also_known_as: gurry shark or grey shark or sleeper shark or eqalussuaq
distribution: polar latitudes from baffin island down to the carolinas in deep water canyons
ecosystem_habitat: cold or deep waters of the arctic and atlantic ocean
taxonomy: order squaliformes (sharks with two dorsal fins) or family somniosus (sleeper sharks)

name: humpback whale
also_known_as: the translation of their scientific name is large winged from new england
distribution: tropical or temperate and sub arctic waters worldwide
ecosystem_habitat: high latitude summer feeding grounds low latitude winter breeding grounds
taxonomy: suborder mysticeti (baleen whales) family balaenopteridae (rorqual whales)

name: leatherback sea turtle
also_known_as: leatherback or leathery turtle
distribution: global oceans tropical to cold temperate waters
ecosystem_habitat: coastal to open ocean deep diver
taxonomy: order chelonii (turtles and tortoises) family dermochelyidae (leatherback sea turtles)

name: lingcod
also_known_as: blue cod or cultus cod or green cod or leopard cod or bluefish or greenling
distribution: northeast pacific from the gulf of alaska or usa to baja california or mexico
taxonomy: order scorpaeniformes (scorpionfishes and flatheads) family hexagrammidae (greenlings)

name: narwhal
also_known_as: unicorns of the sea or qilalugaq tugaalik
distribution: arctic ocean in canada or greenland and europe
ecosystem_habitat: sheltered deep water coastal areas and deep fjords
taxonomy: suborder odontoceti (toothed whales) family monodontidae (white whales)

name: north atlantic right whale
also_known_as: black whales
distribution: warm temperate to subpolar latitudes of the north atlantic ocean
taxonomy: order cetacea (whales or dolphins and porpoises) or family balaenidae (right whales)

name: northern gannet
also_known_as: gannet
distribution: both sides of the atlantic from labrador and norway south to the equator
ecosystem_habitat: nest on rocky shores and cliffs feed in the ocean
taxonomy: order siliformes (cormorants or gannets and relatives) family sulidae (gannets and boobies)

name: northern shrimp
also_known_as: northern prawn or deepwater prawn or pink shrimp
distribution: northwest atlantic and northeast pacific ocean
ecosystem_habitat: soft bottoms with features that provide protection
taxonomy: subphylum crustacea (crabs or shrimps or and relatives) family penaeidae (prawns)

name: orca
also_known_as: killer whale or blackfish or aarluk
distribution: global all latitudes in all oceans
conservation_status: endangered or threatened or special concern
taxonomy: order cetacea (whales or dolphins or and porpoises) or family delphinidae (dolphins)

name: pacific herring
also_known_as: sea herring or sild or hareng
distribution: throughout the north pacific or ranging from alaska down to mexico
ecosystem_habitat: pelagic to coastal in cold to temperate waters
taxonomy: order clupeiformes (herrings) family clupeidae (herrings or shads or sardines and menhadens)

name: pilot whale
also_known_as: blackfish or caa’ing whale or pothead whale
distribution: short finned tropical or sub tropical long finned temperate or subarctic
taxonomy: suborder odontoceti (toothed whales) family delphinidae (dolphins)

name: polar bear
also_known_as: sea bear or ice bear or white bear or nanuq
distribution: circumpolar arctic
taxonomy: order carnivora (carnivorans) family ursidae (bears)

name: pom pom anemones
also_known_as: tentacle shedding anemone
distribution: deep waters in the north east pacific ocean
ecosystem_habitat: sandy or muddy or and gravel bottoms
taxonomy: class anthozoa (corals or anemones and relatives) or order actiniaria (true sea anemones)

name: redfish (acadian and deepwater)
also_known_as: atlantic redfish or redfish or rosefish or beaked redfish or ocean perch
distribution: northern atlantic
conservation_status: special concern or threatened or endangered
taxonomy: order scorpaeniformes (scorpionfishes and flatheads) family sebastidae

name: sea otter
also_known_as: null
distribution: north east pacific ocean
ecosystem_habitat: shallow or coastal waters often found in kelp canopies
conservation_status: endangered or threatened or special concern
taxonomy: order carnivora (carnivores) family mustelidae (weasels)

name: sea pens
also_known_as: null
distribution: range depends on species or some are circumglobal while others are more restricted
taxonomy: class anthozoa (corals or anemones and relatives) order pennatulacea (sea pens)

name: sea strawberry
also_known_as: soft red coral
distribution: polar to temperate arctic or atlantic and pacific oceans
taxonomy: class anthozoa (corals or anemones and relatives) or order alcyonacea (soft corals)

name: sockeye salmon
also_known_as: blueback or kennerly’s salmon or kokanee or little redfish or pygmy salmon or silver trout
distribution: throughout the north pacific ocean
taxonomy: order salmoniformes (salmons) family salmonide (salmons or trouts and chars)

name: thorny skate
also_known_as: thorny back or thornback or maiden ray or starry ray or starry skate
distribution: north atlantic northwest atlantic from greenland and hudson bay south carolina
taxonomy: order rajiformes (skates and relatives) family rajidae (skates)

name: tufted puffin
also_known_as: null
distribution: northern pacific from california or through canada to alaska and in japan and northeastern asia
taxonomy: class aves (birds) or family alcidae (auks)

name: yelloweye rockfish
also_known_as: red snapper or pacific red snapper or red rock cod or yellow belly
distribution: northeast pacific
taxonomy: order scorpaeniformes (scorpionfishes and flatheads) or family sebastidae (rockfishes)
